OK, so I tried this and liked it.  Had two actual conversations with people.  And like Chat  Roulette, it was refreshingly devoid of penises.  Good luck with it!
@ericflo django/xmpp

@shadowlayer we gained some decent traction after launching at techcrunch50 and a very awesome initial userbase.   Given the realtime nature of the site, it is hard to keep users on your site.  It kind of happens in bursts.  This latest version has seen the best traction yet.  There are people using the site 24hours a day which is the best thing that can happen for a realtime communication tool.
